markdownRemark.html: This entry is for the programming nerds. 10 PRINT, a book about the commandore 64 takes one line of code to demonstrate the concept of generative art. It is incredibly simple for something that looks so amazing. This is literally only just randomised tiled diagonal lines.

frontmatter.title: JS Conf Animation: random tiled lines
